verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] told the United States ' allies they should be supporting the North American bid for the 2026 World Cup , and not Morocco 's , in a veiled threat on Twitter .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] has [V: told] [ARG2: the United States ' allies] [ARG1: they should be supporting the North American bid for the 2026 World Cup , and not Morocco 's] , [ARGM-LOC: in a veiled threat on Twitter] .
